import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''d:/vnss_tms/backend''\)
from sqlalchemy import create_engine, text
import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv\(''d:/vnss_tms/backend/.env''\)
DATABASE_URL = os.getenv\(''DATABASE_URL'', ''postgresql+psycopg://tms:tms@localhost:5432/tms''\)
engine = create_engine\(DATABASE_URL\)
with engine.connect\(\) as conn:
    result = conn.execute\(text\(''SELECT product_code, hs_code, description_vi FROM hs_code_catalog WHERE product_code IS NOT NULL LIMIT 10''\)\)
    for row in result:
        print\(f''product_code={row[0]}, hs_code={row[1]}, desc={row[2][:40] if row[2] else """"}...''\)
""")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update UI/UX: AI Chat improvements, brand colors, and login page redesign

- Replace Hotline with AI Chat button in CTA section
- Add visitor ID tracking for anonymous chat history \(localStorage\)
- Save/restore chat history for returning visitors \(7-day retention\)
- Update AI system prompt: ask clarifying questions before long answers
- Reduce AI max tokens \(1000\) and increase temperature \(0.8\) for natural conversation
- Remove AI Assistant from sidebar menu \(use Topbar AI button instead\)
- Update login page with 9log brand colors \(red gradient theme\)
- Fix logo display: [9]log.tech format across all pages

- Auto-focus chat input after sending message
- Resize chat widget to 380x500px
